img_above_text:
## Guangmou Location
Follow the path from the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine and make your way down to the large, flat, open area filled with bamboo and skeleton enemies. At the edge of this area is a small gap in the rock wall that you can pass through. Guangmou will be waiting for you inside.
img_below_text:
## Guangmou Fight
Guangmou has a lot of magic-based attacks that can hit you from all angles and can inflict status effects. Here are the attacks you can expect to see in the Guangmou fight:

img_summary: The image depicts a player character navigating a dense, bamboo-filled forest area with a mystical and atmospheric environment. The scene features detailed rock carvings and a glowing light source, suggesting a significant location, possibly the entrance to Guangmou's lair. This image serves to visually represent the journey described in the preceding text, where the player is directed to find Guangmou by passing through a gap in the rock wall. It sets the tone for the upcoming encounter detailed in the following text.
